title: Dishes
description: Rich and robust,  our plant-based dishes are hearty, “tasty” and with full depth of flavor.

title: Deserts
description: A seductive tasting sensation created with passion by our skilled Artisans. We have a variety of deserts including Waffles,Brownies, Pasteries, Sundaes and Custard.

title: Drinks
description: We have a variety of drinks with fresh ingredients like seasonal fruit, vegetables, herbs and spices to create healthier refreshing drinks for all seasons. Introduced Sangria a summer classic containing the perfect combination of wine, fruit and ice for a refreshing summer drink.
